segments.text: Yes , we do . I'll show you several kinds .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like both of the two hats . Can you give me a discount if I buy both of them
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , we'll take 20 % off the price .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like this colour and it is very bright .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This color is becoming to you , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I think so . How much are they ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The pink one is 30 yuan , and the purple one is 35 yuan .
segments.speaker: S2
